title: Kate Middleton wears nude £10 New Look shoes for Pakistan tour
text:
The Duchess of Cambridge paired her blue kurta and scarf with a pair of £10 New Look shoes today - and they've already sold out.

Kate Middleton, 37, wore the nude high street shoes for the first official day of the couples tour in Pakistan.

The shoes, which feature a pointed toe, a small block heel and an ankle strap were fashionably paired with traditional dress for the mother-of-three while she headed to her first meeting in Islamabad.

The shoes, which are normally £23.99, have been discounted in the nude colour, while the shoes are still available in navy and black.

Kate Middleton, 37, wore the nude high street shoes for the first official day of the royal couples tour in Pakistan

The shoes, which are normally £23.99, have been discounted in the nude colour, while the shoe is still available in navy and black

The wide fit suedette shoes have a two inch heel and also have a gold buckle and stitching detail on the strap.

The royal later changed into a pair of Russell & Bromley flats which are practical for royal walkabouts.

Kate Middleton again paid a touching tribute to Princess Diana today as she wore a dress similar to what Princess of Wales wore when she met young cancer patients at the Imran Khan Shaukat Khanum memorial hospital in Lahore in May 1997.

Her traditional blue kurta and scarf was made by Maheen Khan, an international Pakistani designer and costume designer.

The shoes, which feature a pointed toe, a small block heel and an ankle strap were fashionably paired with traditional dress for the mother-of-three while she headed to her first meeting in Islamabad

The couple ere visiting the Islamabad Model College for Girls in the capital, touring classrooms and posing for a group picture with some of the young students, ranging from kindergarten age students to sixth formers

The couple were visiting the Islamabad Model College for Girls in the capital, touring classrooms and posing for a group picture with some of the young students, ranging from kindergarten age students to sixth formers.

Yesterday, the Duchess of Cambridge looked glamorous as she touched down in Pakistan wearing blue and white bespoke Catherine Walker - a traditional Pakistani outfit comprised of a flared kurti, a long shirt, and trousers.

She paired the custom look with nude heels and a pearl clutch bag for a seamless look, as the couple became the first royals to visit the troubled nation for 13 years.

The shoes, which are normally £23.99, have been discounted in the nude colour, while the shoe is still available in navy (pictured) and black

description: Kate Middleton, 37, wore the nude high street shoes for the first official day of the  couples tour in Pakistan. The shoes, which are normally £23.99, have been discounted in the nude colour.
